name: Sampa 2077
description:
With the same group that developed Snake-Pix and Megalohealth, Sampa 2077 was created during a game jam from FIAP, a brazilian university. We had the challenge to create a simple game with a cyberpunk theme during a week and a half, as a first grade final work. 

The game was inspired by Cyberpunk 2077 (quite obvious), Metal Slug and Kirby. The story covers a dystopic future in São Paulo, Brazil. You control Aurora, a member from a revolutionary group that has a mission to reveal the hideous secrets of a megacorporation. Aurora has a special skill that allows her to copy living and inanimate things. 

Our game was chosen as one of the 3 best games of the game jam. 

I was responsible for programming, game design and some interface and art features.

Sampa 2077 was created with Unity Engine and it runs on PC.

Language: Portuguese.
